item.title: HTB Cyber-Apocalypse 2024 - Delulu
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: Delulu is a very easy difficulty challenge that features format string vulnerability, overwriting a variable’s value.

item.title: HTB Cyber-Apocalypse 2024 - Writing on the Wall
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: As you approach a password-protected door, a sense of uncertainty envelops youâ€”no clues, no hints. Yet, just as confusion takes hold, your gaze locks onto cryptic markings adorning the nearby wall. Could this be the elusive password, waiting to unveil the door’s secrets?

item.title: CygenixCTF - Chain it
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: Where there is code, there is a way in.
